markdownRemark.html:
:My Journey:

UMass Crypto Group - Adviced by Prof. Adam O’Neill
UMass MLSys Group - Adviced by Prof. Hui Guan
UMass HCI-VIS Group - Adviced by Prof. Narges Mahyar and Prof. Ali Sarvgadh

frontmatter.title: Graduate Student Researcher
frontmatter.description:
• Created a multi-agent chatbot design to research the effects of turn-taking and UI on a coversation with more than one expert AI system [as a part of HCI-VIS group]
• Applied a neural architeccture search strategy to find a computationally light-weight fusion strategy for multimodal behavioral analysis [as a part of MLSys group]; achieved 10x speedup while competing woth 78.65% state of the art accuracy
• Composed a tunable security concept to make a trade-off between security and speed for the message authentication code and digital signatures [as a part of Crypto group]; the scheme achieves tunable quantum security with short, ~60 bit signatures
